mapper.insert: INSERT INTO petsit(petNum, petYN, petYard, petLarge, petTitle, petContent, petFamily, petWalk,petLiving, petChild, petCertif, mId, petAct) VALUES(#{petNum}, #{petYN}, #{petYard}, #{petLarge}, #{petTitle}, #{petContent},#{petFamily}, #{petWalk},#{petLiving}, #{petChild}, #{petCertif}, #{mId}, #{petAct})
INSERT INTO petSchedule(petNum, mon, tue, wed, thu, fri, sat, sun) VALUES(#{petNum}, #{mon}, #{tue}, #{wed}, #{thu}, #{fri},#{sat}, #{sun})
INSERT INTO petImage(petImgNum, petNum, petImg) VALUES (petImage_seq.NEXTVAL, #{petNum}, #{petImg})
